Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Flournoy St, Laramie, 16th and Cicero due to police activity near Cicero/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Flournoy St, Laramie, 16th, then resume their normal route on Cicero due to police activity near Cicero/Roosevelt.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Cermak. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Cermak. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
